entities.name: sorting hat
entities.description: The Sorting Hat is a magical entity that sorts students into their respective houses. It is mentioned as having a new song.

entities.name: ron weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is a student at Hogwarts and a friend of Harry's. He is described as having forgotten something.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Hermione Granger is a student at Hogwarts and a friend of Harry's. She is described as calling out to the new students.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a student at Hogwarts and the main character. He is described as grinning at the new students.

entities.name: euan abercrombie
entities.description: Euan Abercrombie is a new student who looks frightened when Harry approaches him.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: Gryffindor is one of the four houses at Hogwarts. It is mentioned as being next to Hufflepuff in the Great Hall.

relationships.description: Harry approaches Euan Abercrombie, who looks frightened.
